Description_lang: Removes all harmful Poison, Disease, Curse, Magic, and Bleed effects and reduces all physical damage taken by $65116s1% for $65116d. $?s195710[This effect shares a 30 sec cooldown with other similar effects.][]

description_blz.en_US: Removes all harmful Poison, Disease, Curse, Magic, and Bleed effects and reduces all physical damage taken by 10% for 8 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Elimina todos los efectos dañinos de veneno, enfermedad, maldición, magia y sangrado, y reduce todo el daño físico recibido un 10% durante 8 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Remove todos os efeitos nocivos de Veneno, Doença, Maldição, Feitiço e Sangramento, reduzindo também em 10% todo dano Físico recebido por 8 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Entfernt jegliche schädlichen Gift-, Krankheits-, Fluch-, Magie- und Blutungseffekte. Zusätzlich wird jeglicher erlittene körperliche Schaden 8 Sek. lang um 10% verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: Removes all harmful Poison, Disease, Curse, Magic, and Bleed effects and reduces all physical damage taken by 10% for 8 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Elimina todos los efectos dañinos de veneno, enfermedad, maldición, magia y sangrado al tiempo que reduce todo el daño físico recibido un 10% durante 8 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Dissipe les effets de poison, maladie, malédiction, magie et saignement néfastes et réduit les dégâts physiques subis de 10% pendant 8 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Dissolve tutti gli effetti dannosi di veleno, malattia, maledizione, sanguinamento e magici e riduce tutti i danni fisici subiti del 10% per 8 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Снимает все вредоносные эффекты кровотечения, яда, проклятий, магии и болезней и уменьшает получаемый физический урон на 10% на 8 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 모든 해로운 독, 질병, 저주, 마법, 출혈 효과를 제거하고 8초 동안 받는 모든 물리 피해를 10%만큼 감소시킵니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 移除所有有害的中毒、疾病、詛咒、魔法和流血效果，並使受到的所有物理傷害降低10%，持續8秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 移除所有有害的中毒、疾病、诅咒、魔法和流血效果，并使你受到的所有物理伤害降低10%，持续8秒。
